thing-type.label: Minoston Toggle Dimmer Switch
thing-type.description: Toggle Dimmer Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtTransform any home into a smart home with the Z-Wave Smart Switch. The switch enables you to wirelessly control to turn lights on and off, schedule a timed event or create a custom scene from anywhere in the world, at any time of the day. Take control of your home lighting with Z-Wave Smart Lighting Controls</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtMake your controller/hub into the "inclusion" mode, triple press the Up/Down push button quickly to include it in the network.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtMake your controller/hub into the "exclusion" mode, triple press the Up/Down push button quickly to exclude it from the network.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Locally Button Function
parameter.description: LED flashes 2 times when the configuration parameter changed.<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLocally Button function(quickly press 7x)</p&gt <p&gtValue=0 Up Button: On/Down Button: Off(Default)<br /&gtValue=1 Up Button: Off/Down Button: On<br /&gtValue=2 Up Button: On/Off/Down Button: On/Off</p&gt <p&gt---Parameter 1: Choose if you want the upper paddle to turn the light on or turn the light off when tapped, or if you'd like any paddle to change the state of the light.</p&gt <p&gtValues: 0 – Upper paddle turns the light on, lower paddle turns the light off (default);</p&gt <p&gtValues: 1 – Upper paddle turns the light off, lower paddle turns the light on;</p&gt <p&gtValues: 2 – any paddle changes the state of the light.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: LED Indicator
parameter.description: LED flashes 2 times<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtLED Indicator(quickly press 6x)</p&gt <p&gtValue=0 On when output Off and Off when output On (default)</p&gt <p&gtValue=1 On when output On and Off when output Off</p&gt <p&gtValue=2 Always Off</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Association Setting Parameter
parameter.description: Association Setting Parameter<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<ul&gt<li&gtValue=00 – none</li&gt <li&gtValue=01 - local</li&gt <li&gtValue=02 - 3way</li&gt <li&gtValue=03 - 3way &amp; local</li&gt <li&gtValue=04 - z-wave hub</li&gt <li&gtValue= Value=05 - z-wave hub &amp; local</li&gt <li&gtValue=06 - z-wave hub &amp; 3-way</li&gt <li&gtValue=07 - z-wave hub &amp; local &amp; 3way</li&gt <li&gtValue=08 - timer</li&gt <li&gtValue=09 - timer &amp; local</li&gt <li&gtValue=10 - timer &amp; 3-way</li&gt <li&gtValue=11 - timer &amp; 3-way &amp; local</li&gt <li&gtValue=12 - timer &amp; z-wave hub</li&gt <li&gtValue=13 - timer &amp; z-wave hub &amp; local</li&gt <li&gtValue=14 - timer &amp; z-wave hub &amp; 3-way</li&gt <li&gtValue=15 - all</li&gt </ul&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Restores state after power failure
parameter.description: Restores state after power failure<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtValue=0 output off<br /&gtValue=1 output on<br /&gtValue=2 output the state after power</p&gt</p&gt
